entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameter name InlineHints should ignore `this.` and `base.` #69793
  • Display inherited documentation as an adornment #69789
  • [BUG] The IDE0022 analyzer mistakenly suggests/fixes code that includes preprocessor directives #69783
  • C# Insert spaces within Square brackets doesn't apply to attributes #69781
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown by FindSymbols.StreamingProgressCollector.OnReferenceFoundAsync #69780
  • Parse errors when conditional directives are combined with raw string literals #69776
    17.8
  • C# out param is not reported as an error in visual studio if a local function is called. #69775
  • ArraySegment<byte> in async method leaves Array null #69777
  • Can not resolve symbol method when using System.Diagnostics.Conditional #69773

Closed

  • Tracking issue to ensure collection spread expression are target typed properly. #69625
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation errors #66235
    Backlog
  • Rename feature (CRTL + R + R) does not work as intended in an edge case #68880
    17.8 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for reading runsettings passed by the client #69792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to background thread before accessing options #69790
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pack our language server in a separate package for each platform #69786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch PatternMatcher to use a TemporaryArray instead of ArrayBuilder. #69784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update the severity combo boxes in EditorConfig UX to reflect the correct semantics #69778
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Feature - Editor Config UI
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Bump decompiler for debugger #69772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Validate that only BoundConversion can have a field typed Conversion #69785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Bump telemetry for fix on ExeName/Version #69771
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublicAPI for 17.7 #69767
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #69747
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add System.IO.Pipelines to Version.Details for source-build #69719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2257089 #69366
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics and fix Full Solution analysis with project config changes #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove EditorFeatures.Cocoa and VSMac IVTs #69765
    Area-IDE, untriaged
